For Identity and Access Management, you can secure single sign-on to cloud and thick client apps. Learn more at https://www.ilantus.com/products/single-sign-on/

As a universal directory, you can create just one directory for all your users and devices to improve productivity and curb helpdesk costs. Learn more at https://www.ilantus.com/products/universal-directory/
As an enterprise class, you can use automated Password Management to improve productivity and curb helpdesk costs. Learn more at https://www.ilantus.com/products/password-management/
Using Wev Access Management, you can securely access resources without a VPN. Learn more at https://www.ilantus.com/products/secure-web-access-management/

In User Lifecycle Management, you can automate provisioning and deprovisioning for all your users across their employment lifecycle. For more information, go to https://www.ilantus.com/products/user-lifecycle-management/

Take advantage of multifactor authentication to safegaurd your accounts against credential theft and fraud. Learn more about Multifactor Authentication at https://www.ilantus.com/products/adaptive-multifactor-authentication/
Secure you organization against toxic combinations with fine-grained Segragation of Duties. Learn more at https://www.ilantus.com/products/segregation-of-duties/
With access request, you can implement multilevel approval workflows with automated provisioning and de-provisioning. Learn more at https://www.ilantus.com/products/access-request/

With access recertification, you can improve security and comply with regulations and policies with automated recertification campaigns. Learn more at https://www.ilantus.com/products/access-recertification/

The manufacturing industry is among the most fast-paced industries. They are continuously on the regular timeline of fulfilling orders. Off late, manufacturing industries have also adapted several new technologies to keep up with the changing times. But, it is important to note, several of these changes can seem unprepared in today’s business landscape. One mistake and breach in one of the manufacturing plants can affect the entire enterprise and end up them losing customers.
